DOC.brief_summary: The study is a multi-center prospective cohort study of active surveillance in papillary thyroid cancer with low risk. The purpose of the study is to observe natural course of low risk papillary thyroid cancer in Korean population, and comparison of prognosis between active surveillance group and conventional surgery group. Patient will be well informed about their choice of active surveillance or surgery.
DOC.brief_title: Active Surveillance on Papillary Thyroid Microcarcinoma
DOC.criteria: who agreed to the agreement form who is older than 18 years old who was diagnosed by fine needle aspiration or needle biopsy of Bethesda category V or VI whose thyroid cancer is smaller than 1 cm length who cannot routinely followup according to the study schedule who was diagnosed by fine needle aspiration or needle biopsy of Bethesda category I, II, III, or IV. who have hyperthyroidism which needs treatment
